optionsSection.title: Consultation Options
optionsSection.subtitle: Choose the consultation type that works best for you

inPerson.title: In-Person Consultation
inPerson.description: Visit our clinic for a comprehensive in-person consultation with our specialists. This includes a detailed hair analysis and personalized treatment recommendations.

video.title: Video Consultation
video.description: Connect with our experts via video call from the comfort of your home. Discuss your concerns and receive professional advice without having to travel.

phone.title: Phone Consultation
phone.description: A convenient option for an initial discussion about your hair concerns and possible treatment options. Our specialists are ready to answer all your questions.
